sentences.en: At this age, the infant begins to react more to visual stimuli.
sentences.cn: 到了这个年龄段，婴儿开始对视觉刺激有了更多的反应。

sentences.en: Books provide children with ideas and a stimulus for play.
sentences.cn: 书不仅给孩子们以思想，而且使他们玩得更有意思。

sentences.en: Descartes received his stimulus from the new physics and astronomy of Copernicus, Galileo, and others.
sentences.cn: 笛卡儿从哥白尼、伽利略等人的新物理学和天文学中得到启发。

sentences.en: For the stimulus debate, this hedge - fund logic has clear implications.
sentences.cn: 上述对冲基金逻辑对刺激辩论的暗示是明确的.

sentences.en: Nothing happens until the excitatory stimulus exceeds a certain'threshold'value.
sentences.cn: 兴奋性刺激超过某一临界值以前毫无反应.

sentences.en: Observe carefully how the bacteria react to this stimulus.
sentences.cn: 仔细观察细菌对这一刺激有什么反应.

sentences.en: Poverty is a stimulus to industry.
Praise is a stimulus for better work.
sentences.cn: 赞扬激励人更努力地工作.

sentences.en: Regard each failure as a stimulus to further efforts.
sentences.cn: 把每次失利看成对进一步努力的激励.

sentences.en: Stimulus was essential to cushion a collapse in private demand.
sentences.cn: 刺激方案是个人需求大幅衰退的必要缓冲.

sentences.en: Tax cuts provided the stimulus which the slow economy needed.
sentences.cn: 减税为不景气的经济带来了其所需的刺激。

sentences.en: The assistants observed carefully how the bacteria would react to this stimulus.
sentences.cn: 助手们仔细观察细菌对这种刺激物会产生什么反应.

sentences.en: The most outlandish people can be the stimulus for love.
sentences.cn: 最容易刺激恋情发生的人往往是异国他乡的人.

sentences.en: They haven't got any intellectual stimulus such as you get up here in the city.
sentences.cn: 他们不象你们生活在城市里的人,在智力上得不到任何启发.

sentences.en: Visual tri - stimulus colorimeters are optical devices.
sentences.cn: 视觉型三刺激值色度计是一种光学装置.

sentences.en: What may be a stimulus at one time may become an obstacle later.
sentences.cn: 在某个时期起推动作用的而后也可能变成障碍.
